attributes.action: extend the free swim program to include disabled people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disabled people have various kinds of problems that can limit their mobility, however swimming or simply being in the water can be enjoyed by everyone. It is a great fitness tool and can change people's mood. However it is very expensive which can stop disabled people from being able to join in, so by extending the free swim program we can make life a little easier for disabled people and their carers.
